org.ecoinformatics.seek.ecogrid.quicksearch

Class DatasetPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.ecoinformatics.seek.ecogrid.quicksearch.DatasetPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, TabPane

    public class DatasetPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements TabPane
    This class will display a panel for search and search result from ecogrid service.
    Author:
    berkley
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
    Created:
    February 17, 2005
